item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:-69 Chances: Lyft’s estimated fair value is US$35.37 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity LYFT is set to thrive in the growing rideshare market, buoyed by competitive pricing and cost-cutting measures The technology sector is going through a major transition Risks: Shares of ride sharing service Lyft fell 5.
